CLEARANCE_ALREADY_GRANTED_BAY_N.message: Odobrenje je već odobreno. Nastavite prema pristaništu {bay}.

CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.description: Shown if player requests docking too far away from station
CLEARANCE_DENIED_TOO_FAR.message: Odobrenje odbijeno. Vaš brod je previše udaljen za provjeru identiteta.

DOCKING_CLEARANCE_EXPIRED.message: Istekla je dozvola za pristajanje. Ako želite pristati, morate ponoviti svoj zahtjev.

STATION_GRAV.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

STATION_GRAV_PRESS.description: Like an airline pilot announcing local weather conditions

WATCH_FOR_TRAFFIC_ON_APPROACH.message: Molimo vas da pripazite na promet na vašem prilazu.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_1.message: {playerShipLabel} ulazite u prostor {station}. Molimo vas da se pridržavate lokalnih propisa.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_2.message: {playerShipLabel}, imamo te na radaru. Nalaziš se u prostoru koji kontrolira {station}.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}, ovdje {station} STC. Ulazite u naš kontrolirani prostor.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_5.message: {playerShipLabel}, dobrodošli u {station}. Imajte na umu da se primjenjuju propisi dok letite kroz našu jurisdikciju.

YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_ENTERING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}, ovdje {station} STC govori. Ulazite u kontrolirani prostor i bio bih vam zahvalan ako me danas ne tjerate da ispunjavam nikakvu papirologiju.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_3.message: {playerShipLabel}, očistili ste kontrolirani prostor {station}. Ograničenja su ukinuta.

YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.description: STC = Space Traffic Control, (analogy of ATC)
YOU_ARE_LEAVING_STATION_SPACE_6.message: {playerShipLabel}, ovdje {station} STC. Vidim da izlazite iz našeg kontroliranog prostora, budite oprezni.
